abstract.t: This document describes an extension of the Stateless IP/ICMP Translation for IPv6 Data Centre Environments architecture (SIIT-DC), which allows applications, protocols, or nodes that are incompatible with IPv6, SIIT-DC and/or Network Address Translation in general to operate correctly in an SIIT-DC environment. This is accomplished by introducing a new component called an Edge Translator, which reverses the translations made by an SIIT-DC Gateway. The application or device is thus provided with seemingly native IPv4 connectivity. The reader is expected to be familiar with the SIIT-DC architecture described in I-D.ietf-v6ops-siit-dc.
